item.description:
@Heaven wrote:

OMG lol, find a tut on this man!
open up the file “client.java”
press Cntrl+F and search for “servername” then delete that line and put it your server name, lets say dongkongscape lol. Save it then compile it and re run.
search multiple times, there is alot more the one instance usually.

item.title: Mofic My char atack lvl and stuff
item.dc:creator: @Heaven Heaven
item.description:
@Heaven wrote:

Open up your source folder, go into the folder “characters” find your character file, double click on it. A text document will come up. find the part where it says

character-rights = ?

Player rights 1 is mod.
Player rights 2 is admin.
player rights 3 is owner.

Changing attack levels, why you need to do that? Once a admin if your using a regular un modified source then type ::master.

or replace the “skills” part of the document with this.

[SKILLS] character-skill = 0 99 486084200 character-skill = 1 99 486001000 character-skill = 2 99 486001800 character-skill = 3 99 486086155 character-skill = 4 99 486000000 character-skill = 5 99 486000000 character-skill = 6 99 486000000 character-skill = 7 99 486000000 character-skill = 8 99 486000000 character-skill = 9 99 486000000 character-skill = 10 99 486005570 character-skill = 11 99 486000000 character-skill = 12 99 486000000 character-skill = 13 99 486000000 character-skill = 14 99 486000000 character-skill = 15 99 486000000 character-skill = 16 99 486000000 character-skill = 17 99 486000000 character-skill = 18 99 486000000 character-skill = 19 99 486000000 character-skill = 20 99 486000000 character-skill = 21 99 486000000 character-skill = 22 99 486000000 character-skill = 23 99 486000000 character-skill = 24 99 486000000

Also, if you really wanted to you could edit the items you have in your bank, heres just a random example.

[BANK] character-bank = 0 4717 999 character-bank = 1 4719 999 character-bank = 2 4721 999 character-bank = 3 4723 999 character-bank = 4 4715 1000 character-bank = 5 4713 1000 character-bank = 6 4711 1000 character-bank = 7 4709 1000 character-bank = 8 4746 999 character-bank = 9 4756 1000 character-bank = 10 4758 1000 character-bank = 11 4760 1000 character-bank = 12 4752 999 character-bank = 13 4750 999 character-bank = 14 4748 999 character-bank = 15 4754 1000 character-bank = 16 4733 999 character-bank = 17 4735 999 character-bank = 18 4737 999 character-bank = 19 4739 999 character-bank = 20 4725 1000 character-bank = 21 4731 1000 character-bank = 22 4729 1000 character-bank = 23 4727 1000

Or edit your friends list and ignores, which you shouldn’t have to do from there but w/e
